bibl.title: The Castration of Uranus and its Physical Consequence in the Derveni Papyrus and the First Stoic Philosophers.
Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé.

bibl.seg: Casadesús Bordoy Francesc, The Castration of Uranus and its Physical Consequence in the Derveni Papyrus (cols. XIII and XIV) and the First Stoic Philosophers.

Miguel Herrero de Jáuregui, Ana I. Jiménez San Cristóbal, Eugenio R. Luján, Raquel Martín Hernández, Marco A. Santamaría, Sofía Torallas Tovar (Eds.), Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé = Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts. 10 (Berlin - New York, 2011) pp. 377-383.
